node.name: FAB Defense AR15 Collapsible Buttstock
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Collapsible Buttstock for your AR15/M16 provides you with enhanced versatility with its stock extension and optional adjustable Cheek Rest.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Collapsible Buttstock for your AR15/M16 provides you with enhanced versatility with its stock extension and optional adjustable Cheek Rest.

 

Collapsible Buttstock AR15 Advantages:

Uniquely designed rubber butt pad for fast and stable shoulder positioning
Unique patented “Anti-Rattle” mechanism, fits perfectly on MIL-SPEC and commercial after-market buffer tubes
Three Integrated Slots for Sling Attachment, One in the Front and Two at the Rear
Two Ambidextrous Metal Quick Release Rear Sling Mount Points
Water-resistant anti rattle storage compartment for two CR123 or AA batteries
Maintains Contour & Size of Original Design
Made from fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

node.name: FAB Defense GL Core S Buttstock
node.short_description: The FAB Defense GL-Core S Buttstock is designed to be short and compact for CQB scenarios whilst providing strength and stability for mid-range engagements.
node.description:
The FAB Defense GL-Core S Buttstock was specifically designed for one of the best Israeli Counter-Terrorism units, to be used as a primary buttstock.

The design process started with the GL-Core buttstock and implemented all the design changes that were requested to create a buttstock that will be short and compact for CQB scenarios but will still provide strength and stability for mid-range engagements.

 

FAB Defense GL Core S Buttstock Advantages:

Small and compact allowing for easy manoeuvrability during CQB
Flat faced rubberized butt-pad designed for use with and without tactical body armour
Interchangeable buffer tube adapters for a tight fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes
Integrated cheek weld optimized for the M4/AR15 platforms
No protruding parts, will not get caught on gear or webbing
Inversed positioning lever will not open accidently
Two integrated quick detach rear sling swivel connectors
Made of durable and light-weight fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

node.name: FAB Defense GL-CORE AR15/M4 Collapsible Buttstock
node.short_description: The FAB Defense GL-CORE Collapsible Buttstock is an ergonomically shaped, rubberised buttpad for quick shouldering and manoeuvring.
node.description:
The FAB Defense GL-CORE Collapsible Buttstock is an ergonomically shaped, rubberised buttpad for quick shouldering and manoeuvring.

The integrated cheek weld, ergonomic buttpad and an interchanging tube adapter, provide an unmatched fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes, with a high level of efficiency and comfort.

 

 

FAB Defense AR15/M4 GL-CORE Collapsible Buttstock Advantages:

Ergonomically shaped rubberized butt-pad for quick shouldering and easy manoeuvring of the weapon
Interchangeable buffer tube adapters for a tight fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes
Integrated cheek weld in an overall compact and sleek design
No protruding parts, will not get caught on gear or webbing
Inversed positioning lever will not open accidently
Two integrated quick detach rear sling swivel connectors
Made of durable and light-weight fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

node.name: FAB Defense GL-Shock CP Buttstock
node.short_description: The revolutionary patented ‘GL-Shock’ CP Buttstock from FAB Defense contains a recoil-reducing mechanism with a built-in premium silicon chrome-alloy spring, creating a State-of-the-Art stock for your M4/M16.
node.description:
The revolutionary patented 'GL-Shock' CP Buttstock from FAB Defense contains a recoil-reducing mechanism with a built-in premium silicon chrome-alloy spring, creating a State-of-the-Art stock for your M4/M16.

 

GL-Shock CP Buttstock Advantages:

Unique Patented “Anti-Rattle” Mechanism
Sleek New Design with No Protruding Parts, Will Not Get Caught on Gear and Webbing
Unique New Slick and Quick Operated Inversed Positioning Lever
Integral Ribbed Rubber Butt Pad with a Non Slip Design
Integrated Quick Detach “QD” Sling Swivel Connectors on Both Sides
Watertight Battery Storage for Two CR123A 3V Lithium Batteries / AA 1.5v
Fits Perfectly on Both Tubes - MIL-SPEC and Commercial Aftermarket!
Made from Mill-Spec Reinforced Composite Polymer
With an Adjustable Cheek Rest.

node.name: FAB Defense Mono Pod Buttstock
node.short_description: The Mono Pod Buttstock from FAB Defense is a sleek and durable Mono-Pod add-on for the GL-SHOCK or GL-MAG Buttstocks for rapid deployment and fine adjustment.
node.description:
The Mono Pod Buttstock from FAB Defense is a sleek and durable Mono-Pod add-on for the GL-SHOCK or GL-MAG Buttstocks and features a two-stage, screw and spring-based extension for rapid deployment and fine adjustment.

 

Mono Pod Buttstock Advantages:

Provides additional support for more steady hold and extremely accurate shooting
Secure retaining mechanism prevents accidental deployment
Easily deployed and retracted into the buttstock by the push of a button
Top-quality rubber foot for enhanced grip on slippery surfaces
Two-stage screw and spring based extension for rapid deployment and fine adjustment
Made of reinforced high-grade polymer composite and 6061 hard anodized aluminum

 

Mono Pod Buttstock Compatibility:

GL-SHOCK & GL-MAG Buttstocks
